page.title: 17Wroxall children at play.
page.content: We asked our class about hobbies and pastimes.We are 13 boys and 4 girls aged nine at Wroxall School.Our favourite games are Monopoly,He-men figures,chess and lego.Our favourite T.V. programmes are 'He-men' and 'Dungeons & Dragons'.Our favourite toys are cars and He-men figures.Our favourite comic is the Beano. When we come home some people like to go out but most like to watch TV.When we play out most play in the garden,5 play in the road,3 in camps. 16 children have their own TV,6 have their own watch.8 children have their own computer at home,7 have a video. Most have a Â£1 a week pocket money. Most people play sport,9 play foot- ball,others go riding,swimming,net- ball and gymnastics.Our favourite hobby was riding a bike,but we also collect stamps,badges and rubbers.
